snippet: Daniel M. Donovan Jr., the district attorney, and City Councilman Vincent J. Gentile, debated the integrity of the grand jury process in a congressional race.
abstract: Republican Daniel M Donovan Jr and Democrat Vincent J Gentile, candidates in special election for vacant congressional seat that represents Staten Island and part of Brooklyn, clash in televised debate over handling of grand jury inquiry into death of Eric Garner.
lead_paragraph: Daniel M. Donovan Jr., the district attorney, and City Councilman Vincent J. Gentile, debated the integrity of the grand jury process in a congressional race.

headline.main: Staten Island Candidates Clash Over Garner Investigation
